title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 28 2021
description:
Michael Berry, from NewsRadio 740 KTRH in Houston, guest hosts. Kids are going to be paying for this covid cruelty for the rest of their lives. Blacks are disproportionately not vaccinated. Michael gives thanks to Clay and Buck. Rush surrounded himself with the best and built the best audience, so we make sure to take your calls! Rachel Maddow falsely said the vaccine would stop the virus. Mailing out covid tests is silly. The 1619 Project founder says parents shouldn't decide what their kids are taught.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
